lyrics.stanza: Seek the Lord while He may be found, Call upon Him while He is near: Let the wicked forsake his way, And the unrighteous man his thoughts: And let him return to the Lord, Unto our God, And He will abundantly pardon, He will abundantly pardon you— Return to the Lord.
